title: Isteri Tuan Ihsan
resume:
Seroja Irdina, a teenage girl was in town. Her life seemed simple. He was a university student by day, by night he is to nightclubs to have fun with friends. Dressed like a modern Hollywood artist and designer hand paper. Stylish and colorful world. However, no one knows the war in his soul.
Mr. Ihsan, the wealthy overshoot age. His life was mired in a long story full of grief. Grief coat was eventually pupate themselves, to avoid heart to fall in love again. His world is only black and white. White, YES. Black, NO. Wealth and success you have, unfortunately, not able to deny his soul ....
